phrases: Back then, I was not really able to love someone properly.
Yet, I could not help but want to be loved.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
What is that supposed to mean?
You went to Nana's place because you were worried, right?
Then what good will lecturing her do?
But it just came out that way.
How can you say things so bluntly
to someone who is heart's been shattered?
But I did it for Nana's sake.
If so, you could have chosen a better time.
But there is meaning in talking to her about it now because of what happened.
What?
Hey Nobo, where is Koichi Sato?
He caught a cold, so he is off today.
Really?
I guess, with the change in temperature lately.
Could we have two beers?
Sure.
What are you doing sneaking around like that, Shoji?
You definitely did not disappear.
- I can see you just fine. - That is not possible...
- Drink with us.
- Watch out!
How naive of you.
You deserve to experience being that character who gets hated
and despised by viewers, but still needs to make appearances.
I should not have come to Jackson's.
What about work?
Do you have the day off?
No sir.
If you must know,
I have the evenings off during the Golden Week holidays.
Just talk like you usually do.
I went to see Nana.
She really hates you,
so I suggest you do not try to fix things and just keep a low profile.
What do you mean by fix things?
Well, because Shoji says
he hates breaking up like this and wants to talk things over with Nana.
What does he want to talk to her about?
Some excuses, perhaps?
No, it is not like I want to make excuses to her...
It is just, I think I should properly apologize to her.
Not a good idea!
If you have no intention
of getting back together with Nana, you should clearly end this relationship!
You have got to realize it is your attitude, trying to hold on to them both,
that hurt both Nana and Sachiko.
You still have not learned your lesson!
I do not think you want to apologize to Nana out of kindness.
By apologizing, you just want to feel better about yourself.
Kyosuke, you are being just as blunt, you know.
Yeah?
It is ok.
My motto is to be kind to women, strict toward men.
Nobo.
I will leave the money here.
You running away?
No.
You are absolutely right.
So on that note, I am going to disappear.
Where to?
What are these flowers?
Do not worry about it.
Bye.
Oh, Shoji!
What?
Please, just let me leave.
That hat belongs to the store.
Thank you very much.
That was lame.
Apparently, it is his girlfriend's birthday.
Sachiko's?
Oh, so that is what the flowers were for.
He was saying she is at work now, but it will be her birthday at midnight
so he wanted to be the first to wish her a Happy Birthday.
That kid's got a kind heart.
Well, well.
He is being all lovey-dovey where we cannot see him.
Good for him.
That is how it should be, for Sachiko's sake.
Oh, hello.
The main issue is with Nana.
Especially with you lecturing her.
I just hope she is still alive.
She will be fine!
Tomorrow's the day of her roommate's live concert.
She was really looking forward to that, so she will be alive until then.
Besides, I promised her that we would drive her there in the evening.
But she might die after that.
Farewell.
Then that will probably also mean the end of this series.
And I was so thrilled that I started crying!
It is the first row!
The first row at a Trapnest concert!
I get to see Takumi in person from that close!
I feel so great I could just die!
Farewell.
But I cannot do that.
If I die, I will not see him.
So there is no way I can die until then.
- Thank goodness for that.
- Thank goodness for that.
Hey, if by any chance Nana cannot come along,
you want to come with me, Jun-chan?
Well... even in the front row, I am not particularly a fan of Trapnest.
Why not go?
It is just a live concert.
That is no fun.
That is exactly what Nana said.
She says I will come if I am in the mood,
then learning that the concert hall's far away, says, that is such a drag.
Far away?
Where exactly is it?
At the Idea Hall.
Idea Hall?
You mean that place back home?
Mhm!
What is the?
Why did not you get tickets to the Tokyo performance?
Because back when I ordered them
I still was not sure if I would be able to come to Tokyo.
On top of that, given the popularity of Trapnest,
even fan club members have a hard time getting tickets for the Tokyo live.
It would be totally sad if I could not get seats.
But I am assured of getting two seats together for the live back home.
And I figured I would see them better than from seats in Tokyo's bigger concert hall.
I am not going!
It would be such a drag.
How come?
You could also visit your folks,
so you would be killing two birds with one stone.
I do not want to visit my folks!
They would only put me to work in those rice fields!
Fine, then.
I will ask Nana again.
She may talk in an unfriendly tone, but inside, she is really kind.
I am sure she will agree to come.
You know, I would think twice about pressuring her to go.
Why not find a guy who is a Trapnest fan and go with him?
Yeah.
You will have a new boyfriend and you get to go to the concert.
That is killing two birds with one stone.
I do not want to boyfriend.
I am through with love.
What are we going to do?
You take love away from Nana, and she is got nothing left.
I have Nana, after all.
As long as I am with Nana, I will not feel lonely.
Since we are both women, we can be ourselves in front of each other.
There is no need to be jealous.
We can always be together without worrying about that kind of stuff.
In comparison, love is tiresome, hurtful, and never lasts.
I have had enough of it.
What I want is not a boyfriend.
I want a knight who will protect me.
But I know very well that,
in the real world, such a person does not exist.
- This is loud! -
This is loud!
No way, it is a full house!
I want to see them from the very front!
We should have come sooner!
What kind of event is this, anyway?!
Punk Night?!
They are all punk bands?!
What a dull title.
I think Nana's band is after this one!
I am going to force my way to the front!
Hey, Nana, do you want a drink?
I do not want one!
It will only get in the way!
Ow!
Oh, no, I cannot get through!
What is this weird vibe?
I cannot get into mood.
That singer's not at all cool.
Thanks!
You need to lose a bit of weight, mate.
I guess they are finished.
Nana's next.
This is my chance to get closer.
Hey, want to stick around for the next one?
Black Stones?
Do not know them.
BLAST for short?
How lame.
How dare you?!
Let us go outside for a smoke.
The main guys have already performed.
Let us go home!
Let us go for a drink.
How come?
Wait a minute, everyone, do not leave yet.
Hey, have you heard?!
The next band is super cool!
What a cute girl.
Yes, I know!
BLAST is really cool!
There is a girl who is into it.
Especially the vocalist, Nana!
She is so powerful for a young woman!
Really?
Is the next band a girl band?
Ah, no.
The vocalist is a woman,
but the drummer and guitarist play like pros.
This is their first live in Tokyo
but they were quite famous back in their hometown.
- Want To check them out?
- Sure.
These blonde curls are really cute.
Are they fake?
No, they are real.
Who is this girl?
Hey, you know, I hear the next band is pretty good.
Huh?
Really?
Why not stay just for the beginning?
Hey, they are saying that the next band's really great.
Let us hear them play.
They are really great?
In that case, let us hear them.
Are they?
Well, I do not know, but...
If they do not perform well, this could be embarrassing.
Looks like a lot of the people have returned.
They are coming!
What am I going to do?
I am getting really nervous.
My heart is beating so hard, it could tear.
Hey, look at them.
That band looks really hot.
Yeah, but a band should be credited, not for its looks, but for its sound.
What is this?
The floor is shaking.
Nana!
Good evening.
We are BLAST.
Back home, she had some dedicated fans.
She was like a celebrity.
It was enough just to stand on my own two feet.
I felt that I was being left behind.
Nana's songs all seemed to consist of that same message.
I feel my eyes tearing up.
That is exactly how I am feeling.
Do not leave me behind, Nana.
What a surprise!
You guys are really talented!
The other performances that came up after you all
looked like those played by children in a school band.
Sure your sound is great.
But how do I put this.
You guys had this great aura emitting from you when you took that stage.
Anyway, you were awesome.
Thank you, Mr. Kyosuke, Ms. Junko.
You can drop the Mr Nobu.
We are the same age as you, after all.
Really?
You are?
You are really mature, so I expected you to be about the same age as Yasu.
You are the one who acts like a kid for his age, Nobu.
You are pretty cool as long as you do not talk.
That is a good call to have you not talk while on stage.
Um, Miss Komatsu.
Do you have plates we can use to divide this for everyone?
Oh, we do not have enough plates.
Just serve it like that.
- Okay. - Misato!
What did you make?
Some vinegared dish and salad.
I figured you would want something light after the concert.
Far out!
You sure are thoughtful, Misato.
Leave the rest to Hachiko.
Come chat with us.
It is fine, it is fine.
- There are not enough seats.
Nobu, move.
- Yes.
What about my seat?
Did you come all the way out here just to see them perform?
- Yes. - You look so cute in that apron.
Shin, that is my apron!
That is great.
You already have such dedicated fans.
But I am surprised that you found out about the live concert.
We got this on a last minute call to fill in an opening.
Nana called me and told me about it.
Is that so?
I just wanted to inform her.
I never expected her to actually come.
Should I not have come?!
Why would you think that?
I am happy you came.
Have a seat.
Thank you!
What is with that Should I not have come?
nonsense?
That sounds stupid.
Does that girl seriously like Nana?
She was crying a lot at the live.
But they are both women.
That is just weird.
- I never imagined I would feel any jealousy. -
These blonde curls are really nice.
I may be the weird one.
That is really cute.
Well then, see you.
Good night.
Good luck with your band!
Hey Nobu, get up.
We are leaving.
No way.
I do not feel well.
Nobu really cannot take alcohol.
And you are too unaffected by alcohol.
Hey, Nana.
Let us let Nobu crash here.
Sure, as you wish.
Well...
I should be going now.
Huh?
Where are you going, Misato?
I have booked a room in a hotel near Tokyo Station.
Really?
Then why do not I get a taxi and take you there?
What a relief.
I thought she was planning on staying here.
Cancel the hotel room.
Just stay here.
That is right.
You came all the way here, after all.
No, it is okay.
I could not.
There is no need to hesitate.
Nobu!
It is decided.
You go home now.
If you stay here, Misato will not be safe.
That is not fair!
Then I will stay at Nobu's place tonight.
I cannot sleep.
Sure I know Nana's not the type that would force herself on another woman,
but what if Misato's into that sorta thing?
Maybe they will get carried away.
Nana was kind of drunk.
Her being in such a good mood is proof she is drunk.
But how do two women do it?
I guess Nana would be on top...
Oh, no!
I almost imagined it!
I would better find myself a boyfriend!
Sexually deprived
Sexually deprived I need to be touched.
Both mentally and physically.
That is why I am having these inexplicable feelings.
I really am in need of a kind man who will take good care of me.
But it is such a burden going through the process of finding a boyfriend.
And falling in love is exhausting.
In the first place, I get too involved when I fall in love.
I am so involved that I lose sight of everything.
That is why things do not work out.
It was like that with Mr. Asano too...
I cannot picture his face anymore.
And I really liked him.
And with Shoji too.
I do not want to think about Shoji now.
I do not want to remember anything.
In the meantime, how am I going to spend the day tomorrow?
As long as I have work, I have got something else to put my mind on.
But I do not work until the day after tomorrow.
On the other hand, if I think I have got to put up with Ms. Sakagami
telling me how useless I am, I really do not want to go.
I want to look for another job and quit this one right away.
No matter how I think it through, I am just not suited for that workplace.
But I wonder, is there such a place in this world I am suited for?
I envy Nana.
Good morning!
I am going to the amusement park with Misato!
I will bet you are envious!
Ha ha ha!
Why not ask me out?!
I want to go to the amusement park, too!
Anyway, I am going out.
I know.
I will go shopping.
I will buy clothes, and make up, and everything I want.
I am going on a shopping spree.
But I do not have any money.
I put that 300,000 yen my mom gave me in a CD deposit.
Hello.
The interest rate is not that great.
- I should not have done it.
- Um,
- I no longer care about - if you are looking for that color...
that detached home with a yard!
M-Miss?
Why is the city full of couples on holidays?
I am going home.
It is already seven of the clock.
I hardly did anything today.
Yet I am really hungry.
What should I do about dinner?
Oh, I know.
I will go to Jackson's.
The people there know me, so I will not be lonely even if I go alone.
But Shoji also hangs out there.
I changed my mind.
I will go to the supermarket and buy something to cook.
I have got to spend less.
Misato's in high school, so she is got classes from tomorrow.
I am sure she is on the train returning home about now.
Then Nana could be back soon.
The ground meat's on sale.
I will make hamburgers.
Why must I run into her here?
Does she live around here too?
Or maybe she is about to go to Shoji's place... and cook in that kitchen...
You are home, Hachiko.
Where did you go?
Hello.
Great timing.
I just finished preparing dinner.
Look at her.
Is not Misato super cute?
Nana bought this for me.
Wha?
Stop taking them away.
Hachi?
Everyone is taking away my places of comfort.
Is this girl going to stay here tonight, too?
This is my home, too!
So do not just do as you please, Nana!
That moment, I was convinced Nana would be furious.
But she had the expression of a scolded child.
Every time I think back about it, it hurts me.
Back then, if I were a bit more mature,
and a bit more understanding of your weaknesses,
would our future have been different?
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
